revised_title: A Fifth Memoir on the Theories of Covariants of Binary Quantics
tldr: This memoir by Arthur Cayley explores the theories of covariants of binary quantics, specifically focusing on quadrics, cubics, and quartics. It also covers the harmonic relation, involution, and homography in the context of bipartite binary quadrics. The author presents expressions for the linear factors of these quantics and discusses their determination.
